summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East Union Street from 30th Avenue to 35th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and re- grading the same, and by constructing curbs and gutters, and concrete sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 359 of the City of Seattle, of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
